vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of a street reconstruction thoroughfare project on Webb Chapel Road from Silverton Drive to Northaven Road - DDM Construction Corporation, lowest responsible bidder of six - Not to exceed $4,944,247.99 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($4,547,400.90), Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($126,000.00), Water Construction Fund ($265,147.09), and Wastewater Construction Fund ($5,700.00)
vote.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of a street reconstruction thoroughfare project on Webb Chapel Road from Silverton Drive to Northaven Road - DDM Construction Corporation, lowest responsible bidder of six - Not to exceed $4,944,247.99 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($4,547,400.90), Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($126,000.00), Water Construction Fund ($265,147.09), and Wastewater Construction Fund ($5,700.00)
